tuv.seg: Maintenance and social welfare payments
Conas cothabháil a mheas mar acmhainn
Men and women are required by law to maintain their dependants
Tá dualgas dlíthiúil ar fhir agus mná a gcuid cleithiúnaithe a chothú
Maintenance can be paid voluntarily or as a result of a maintenance order granted by the courts
Tá tuilleadh faisnéise ar chothabháil a lorg agus a chur i bhfeidhm
More information about how to apply for and enforce maintenance is available in our document 'Maintenance orders and agreements'
ar fáil sa doiciméad maidir leis orduithe agus comhaontuithe cothabhála
If you are applying for a social assistance payment you must satisfy a means test
Ní mór duit tástáil acmhainne a shásamh má tá tú ag déanamh iarratais ar íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh
All your sources of income (for example, employment, capital, cash income and maintenance) are assessed by the Department of Social Protection (DSP)
Tá do foinsí ioncaim go léir (mar shampla fostaiocht, caipiteal, airgead tirim agus cothabháil) measúnaithe ag an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí
This document explains how maintenance is assessed in the means test
Mínionn an doiciméad seo cothabháil a n-áirítear sa tástáil acmhainne amháin
More information on other sources of income and how they are assessed is available in our document on the means test
Tá tuilleadh eolais faoi foinsí ioncaim agus conas a mheasúnaítear siad ar fáil sa doiciméad maidir leis an tástáil acmhainne
Maintenance is assessed as means when you apply for the following payments:
Déanfar aon chothabháil a fhaigheann tú a mheas mar acmhainn má dhéanann tú iarratas ar cheann de na híocaíochtaí seo a leanas:
• Jobseeker’s Transitional payment (JST)
• Íocaíocht idirthréimhseach Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist
• Widow's, Widower's or Surviving Civil Partner's (Non-Contributory) Pension
• Pinsean Baintrí, Baintrí Fir nó Páirtnéara Shibhialta Mharthanaigh (Neamh-Ranníocach)
All income from maintenance is assessed as means
Meastar ioncam iomlán ó chothabháil mar acmhainn
This includes both maintenance for you and maintenance to you for any of your children
Áirítear cothabháil duitse agus cothabháil chugatsa le haghaidh duine ar bith de do leanaí araon anseo
If you are getting maintenance from more than one person it will be added together and the total will be assessed as means
Má fhaigheann tú cothabháil ó níos mó ná duine amháin cuirfear é go léir le chéile agus measfar an t-iomlán mar acmhainn
Maintenance paid to your spouse, civil partner or cohabitant is also taken into account as means
Tá an chothabháil go léir inmheasta mura ndéantar an íocaíocht shonraithe a mhiondealú
Maintenance not taken into account
Cothabháil nach bhfuil inmheasta

Half of all maintenance paid is disregarded or not taken into account in the means test. In addition your rent or mortgage repayment up to a maximum of €95.23 per week can be offset against maintenance payments
Féadfar d'aisíocaíocht cíosa nó morgáiste d'uasmhéid €95.23 sa tseachtain a fhritháireamh in aghaidh íocaíochtaí cothabhála
Half the balance of maintenance is then assessed as means and your social welfare payment will be reduced by that amount
Ansin meastar leath an fhuílligh mar acmhainn chun an ráta íocáíochta leasa shóisialaigh atá dlite duit a ríomh
If you do not have any housing costs half of your means from maintenance is assessed
Ní mór duit fianaise a thabhairt ar d'íocaíochtaí cíosa nó morgáiste

Getting a payment before 2003
Ag fáil íocaíocht roimh 2003
If you were getting one of the payments listed above before 2003 you may qualify to have your maintenance assessed using the old rules
Má fuair tú íocaíocht atá liostaithe thuas roimh 2003, féadfaidh tú a cháiliú chun do chothabháil measúnaithe de réir na seanrialacha
The Department of Social Protection provides more detailed information about these rules and the assessment of maintenance as means
Soláthraíonn an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí tuilleadh eolais faoi na rialacha seo agus an measúnu cothabhála mar acmhainn
How maintenance is assessed for Rent Supplement
Conas a mheastar cothabháil i gcomhair Forlíonadh Cíosa agus Forlíonadh Ús Morgáiste
In the means test for Rent Supplement maintenance is assessed as additional household income and maintenance payments up to €95.23 per week are assessed in full

Sna tástálacha acmhainne don Forlíonadh Cíosa agus don Forlíonadh Ús Morgáiste déantar cothabháil a mheasúnú mar ioncam teaghlaigh bhreise (féach thuas) agus déantar íocaíochtaí chothabhála suas go dtí €95.23 in aghaidh na seachtaine a mheasúnú ar an iomlán
The household income disregard applies to maintenance payments above this amount
Baineann an neamhaird ioncaim teaghlaigh le híocaíochtaí chothabhála os cionn an méid seo
Household income disregard: A certain amount of your household income above the SWA rate for your situation is not taken into account
Neamhaird Ioncaim Teaghlaigh: Ní thugtar méid áirithe de d'ioncam teaghlaigh san áireamh
€75 of any additional household income is not taken into account and 25% of additional household income over €75 is not taken into account

Ní thugtar €75 de ioncam teaghlaigh bhreise ar bith san áireamh. Ioncam teaghlaigh bhreise is eaé ioncam ó fhostaíocht pháirtaimseartha nó féinfhostaíocht pháirtaimseartha, Forlíonadh Ioncam Teaghlaigh (FIT, Fostaíocht Pobail (FP), Liuntas um Fhilleadh ar Obair, Liúntas Fiontraíochta um Fhilleadh ar Obair nó cúrsa FÁS
There is no upper limit on the amount that can be disregarded
Ní thógtar 25% den ioncam teaghlaigh bhreise os cionn €75 san áireamh freisin
Read more about calculating Rent Supplement
Níl aon uasteorainn ar an méid gur féidir neamhaird a dhéanamh de
How maintenance is assessed for Family Income Supplement
Conas cothabháil a mheas i gcomhair Forlíonadh Ioncam Teaghlaigh
If you are getting maintenance, the total amount of your maintenance payment (including payments for children) will be assessed as income for Family Income Supplement (FIS)
Má tá tú ag fáil cothabhála, déanfar méid iomlán d’íocaíochta cothabhála (íocaíochtaí do leanaí san áireamh) a mheasúnú mar ioncam i gcomhair Forlíonadh Ioncam Teaghlaigh (FIT)
Only one FIS payment can be made in respect of any family
Ní féidir ach aon íocaíocht FIT amháin a dhéanamh maidir le haon teaghlach
This means that if you are applying for FIS the parent from whom you are getting maintenance must not be getting FIS
Ciallaíonn sé nach bhféadfaidh an tuismitheoir a bhfuil tú ag fáil cothabhála uaidh/uaithi a bheith ag fáil FIT má dhéanann tú iarratas ar FIT
How maintenance is assessed for a child with a means-tested social assistance payment
Conas a mheastar cothabháil do leanbh a fhaigheann íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh de réir tástála acmhainne
If you are getting Jobseeker's Allowance any maintenance paid to your parent on your behalf is assessed as benefit and privilege against you
Má tá Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist á fháil agat, déantar aon chothabháil a íoctar go díreach leatsa nó a íoctar le do thuismitheoir ar do shon a mheas i do choinne mar sochar agus pribhléid
If a portion of the maintenance is paid directly to you this portion is assessed as cash income against you and the remainder which is paid to your parent is assessed as benefit and privilege
Má íoctar cuid don chothabháilgo díreach leatsa, meastar an chuid seo i do choinne mar airgead tirim agus meastar an fuílleach a íoctar le do thuismitheoir mar sochar agus pribhléid
If you are getting Disability Allowance any maintenance in the form of cash income from either parent is assessable as means
Tá cothabháil i bhfoirm airgid thirim ó cheachtar tuismitheoir inmheasta mar acmhainn má tá Liúntas Míchumais á fháil agat
